newsitem.title: USA: Ameritech to build 17 new retail centers.
newsitem.headline: Ameritech to build 17 new retail centers.

text.p: Ameritech Corp said Thursday it will build 17 new Ameritech Communications Centers in the Midwest and remodel four existing stores by the end of 1997.
Ameritech, which provides communications services, said the centers will open throughout the year in Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Missouri, Ohio and Wisconsin.
The remaining 99 existing Ameritech Cellular Centers will receive graphic enhancements, new displays and lighted pylons throughout 1997.
The communication centers will offer cellular phones and service, cable television, Internet access, home security monitoring, residential phones and call management services.
